description: Schema for data extracted from a 3HK monthly consolidated bill (Final Unified Schema). This schema forces a single, standardized structure, including nested keys, to ensure consistent CSV output.

provider.description: Name of the telecom provider. MUST be '3HK'.

__filename.description: The filename of the source PDF document.

customer_name.description: The standardized key for the company name being billed.

account_number.description: The standardized key for the customer's account number. Corresponds to 'Account No.'.

invoice_number.description: The standardized key for the invoice number. 3HK bills do not have this, so the value should be null.

invoice_date.description: The standardized key for the bill issue date, in YYYY-MM-DD format. Corresponds to 'Bill Date'.

payment_due_date.description: The standardized key for the payment due date, in YYYY-MM-DD format. Corresponds to 'Payment Due Date'.

billing_summary.description: A standardized object for the summary of charges, payments, and balances.

previous_bill_amount.description: Standardized key. Not explicitly available on the bill, should be set to 0.0.

payment_received.description: Standardized key. Not explicitly available on the bill, should be set to 0.0.

balance_forwarded.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to 'Balance Brought Forward'.

total_amount_due.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to 'Total Amount Due'.

service_details.description: A standardized array containing the detailed charges for each service (phone) number.

user_name.description: The standardized key for the user's name. Not applicable for 3HK, so the value should be null.

subtotal.description: The subtotal for the service number.

charge_items.description: A standardized array of all individual charges, fees, and rebates for this service number.

description.description: Standardized key. The English description of the charge or credit.

period.description: Standardized key. The date or period the charge applies to.

amount.description: Standardized key. The value of the line item. MUST be negative for items marked with 'CR'.
